msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Some writing on Verso
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 4171; 4910

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the left, top and right sides; yet the left hand side is cut in two cuts. Kollesis is at the end of the taxpayer���s names. Although the damage at the end of the column, almost all the letters still clear. No restoration is needed. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the taxpayer. The scribe wrote some words on the verso, presumably as a draft.
